content: others to make i am making these caps in honor of breast cancer awareness month october i am making my caps for halos of hope www halosofhope org ** i made this pattern on 10-1-2011 on size us 6 needles and the cap is roomy and comfortable since the cap is essentially all ribbing it is very stretchy and should fit a lot of head sizes ** i made the pattern again on 10-2-2011 on size us 4 needles the cap is rather snug and small i think if you want a snugger fitting cap you would want to use size us 5 needles but no smaller than that
